title: How does Poppy W work?
body: Reallyed confused, does it only apply damage to people who FLash/Dash?

replies.body:
Read the ability.  Watch the spotlight if you still don't get it.

It's explicitly stated in both.
It stops a single dash from an enemy champion.  I believe it applies damage if they are inside it, but idk.

Its bugged

If 2 Poppys have W on, only one of the dashes go thru to stun in a wall collision, the other is dashed blocked, report it to riot please
